fryingPan:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
fryingPan:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

fryingPan:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
fryingPan:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
fryingPan:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

fryingPan:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
fryingPan:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

fryingPan:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
fryingPan:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !fryingPan:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

fryingPan:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
fryingPan:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !fryingPan:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
